00079 float Point3::dist( Point3 p1 )
00080 {
00081         Point3 tmp = p1 - *this;
00082         float len = sqrt( tmp.x *tmp.x + tmp.y * tmp.y + tmp.z * tmp.z );
00083         return len;
00084 };
